structure.unit: ARTICLE III. CITY OF MIAMI MINIMUM HOUSING STANDARDS

text.section: Any person or persons, jointly or severally, aggrieved by any final action taken or final decision rendered pursuant to the provisions of this article, may seek to have such action or decisions reviewed by the Circuit Court of Miami-Dade County by petition for certiorari in the manner prescribed by the rules of court, provided such person or persons shall have first exhausted the administrative remedies provided for herein.
